name: Dollar Store Frolf
description:
Since the dawn of time humans have sought to conquer their darkest fears. Chief among these is the fear of throwing plastic discs into metal baskets. Stare death in the face as you play this lighthearted casual Frisbee golf game from Comfort Food Games. 

Strive for the perfect score as you take on our three unique 9-hole courses: A medieval town, an over-sized science lab, and a robot circus. To help you, each disc can be boosted in four directions while it is in the air. 

We sincerely hope you play and enjoy Dollar Store Frolf. Even though we may be very new to making games, we still want them to be fun so we appreciate any and all feedback. The game is free so please do not feel obligated, but any and all donations are greatly appreciated and would be used to fund a new project or add new courses and updates to this game.
